```
FROM openjdk:17-alpine
ARG JAR_FILE=target/my-app.jar
COPY ${JAR_FILE} my-app.jar
ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/my-app.jar"]
```

```
version: "3.9"
services:
  database:
    image: mysql:5.7
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
  web:
    image: my-application:latest
    ports:
      - "80:5000"
volumes:
  db_data: {}
```
